text: @TMobile @Tesla #TMobileTuesdays #contest. I’d  take a road trip to rural IL from Seattle to visit my 80 year old dad when it is safe to do. Had to cancel my trip earlier this year due to the coronavirus. It would be a fun drive & prob a bit of a challenge to find charging routes. Sign me up!
